Text:
I can't always seed, but I try my best. So be patient, it will download eventually.
Also, please help with the seeding, many thanx to those who do.
Does anyone know how to make it work under Windows 7? I get error message "your video harware does not support resolution 320x200 Mode X".

No clue. I personally boycott Win7 for the time being.
Check this, other people have the same problem as well and maybe these instructions may prove to be of some help:

http://www.hotud.org/agora/topic?id=519

Please give feedback for other Win7 users. ;)
